story:
Once upon a time in the ancient land of Persia, there lived a young boy named Ali. Ali was a kind and adventurous boy who loved exploring the forests and playing by the streams near his village.

One night, as Ali lay in his bed under the twinkling stars, he heard a gentle voice calling out to him. It was the wise old owl from the nearby forest. The owl told Ali about a magical golden lantern hidden deep within the heart of the forest that granted wishes to those who found it.

Excited by the possibility of making a wish, Ali set out on a journey through the enchanted forest. He encountered mystical creatures along the way, from playful fairies to mischievous sprites, who guided him closer to the golden lantern.

After many trials and tribulations, Ali finally reached the heart of the forest where he found the golden lantern glowing with a warm and inviting light. Taking a deep breath, Ali closed his eyes and made his wish with all his heart.

When he opened his eyes, he found himself back in his cozy bed, surrounded by the warmth of his home. As he looked outside his window, he saw that the forest was bathed in a golden light, a gentle reminder of the magical adventure he had experienced.

And from that day on, Ali learned that the true magic was not in the wishes granted by the lantern, but in the journey itself and the memories that would stay with him forever.

With a heart full of gratitude, Ali drifted off to sleep, knowing that the enchanting world of the forest would always be there, waiting to be explored once again.

The end. Goodnight, my dear child. May your dreams be filled with wonder and magic.
